title: SeCeIT Integration pt I: Part for Team IBIS
description:
Description
Aim is to terminate the obligation to select the right provisioning path by integrating the selection logic into the configurator.
Offers for all hardware and services in every configurator shall work according to the specific rules.
The provisioning path selection will be made when handing over the configured product to the shopping cart.
For preparation of the main configurators the four tiles for accessoires will be transformed first.
These are "Hardware Zubeh√∂r", "Headsets", "IP Phones" and "Router".
We will start with an exploration for one of them and then four implementations will follow.
After this preparation step the main configurators will be transformed in the following order:
Company Access symmetrisch
Company Start
Company Pro
Business Start Pro
Baustellenanschluss
Company EINS
Company Flex
Each one of them will have an exploration and an implementation story afterwards.
For number 2-5 there are three accessoires configurator which leads to the assumption of being the same.
